name: In Sync: 2 Fun Balls
summary:
In Sync is a super fun offline single-player puzzle game where you control two balls, which are in sync. Make a move and they will both roll in the same direction. You must have a steady hand to roll them around the traps, through the gaps, and on the winding paths at the top of the walls at the same time.

Challenge yourself with this addictive tricky puzzle game, where you have to be resourceful to find the right path to victory. All levels are unique, and will provide you with lots of fun.
